title: Can't change Chroma pack with new champ select?
body: Anyone else having this problem?  Really kind of annoying.

replies.body:
'Ello! 

Thanks for taking the time to report this! ^-^

This is one of [several known issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) with the new Champion Select. As [RiotLyte noted](https://twitter.com/RiotLyte/status/687708296648634368), this should be resolved in Patch 6.2.
hopefully, i mean kinda BS we paid money for something and we cant use it.
wow so sad, just bought chroma for Leona and cant even use it for the start of new season. how do you even miss this?
